mapper.select: SELECT C.EY_ACCOUNT_NUM as accountNum, C.AMOUNT_CURRENT as amountCurrent, C.AMOUNT_ADJ_CR as crAmountAdj, C.AMOUNT_ADJ_DR as drAmountAdj, #C.AMOUNT_AUDIT_CURRENT as amountAutidCurrent, C.`AMOUNT_AUDIT_LAST`as amountAuditLast FROM pbc_c C where 1 = 1 and C.FUND_ID = #{fundId} and C.PERIOD = #{period}
